name: Vegan Bacon with Mushrooms
description: If you used to love bacon and are looking for a vegan alternative, you will LOVE this vegan bacon with mushrooms. It's ready in just 15 minutes and so much it's so much healthier than real bacon. The savory flavor will make you go back for seconds and thirds!

recipeInstructions.text: Clean the mushrooms and slice them with a sharp knife.
recipeInstructions.name: Clean the mushrooms and slice them with a sharp knife.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl combine the ingredients for the marinade (smoked paprika powder, soy sauce, liquid smoke, vegan Worcestershire sauce, and maple syrup). Season with salt and pepper. Whisk until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl combine the ingredients for the marinade (smoked paprika powder, soy sauce, liquid smoke, vegan Worcestershire sauce, and maple syrup). Season with salt and pepper. Whisk until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Put the sliced mushrooms in a bowl and pour the marinade over the mushrooms.
recipeInstructions.name: Put the sliced mushrooms in a bowl and pour the marinade over the mushrooms.

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully stir the mushrooms with a wooden spoon until they're completely marinated.
recipeInstructions.name: Carefully stir the mushrooms with a wooden spoon until they're completely marinated.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some olive oil in a large nonstick pan on high heat (the mushrooms will shrink considerably during the cooking process). Add the mushrooms and drizzle another 1/2 teaspoon of soy sauce and 1/2 teaspoon of maple syrup on top. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve on a sandwich with vegan mayonnaise, lettuce, and tomatoes (vegan BLT) or with scrambled tofu or hash browns. Enjoy!
